backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with types and storage maps for videos, comments, interactions, and user data, including logic for computing interaction summaries.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI opacity changes to specific frontend files and components with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and layout elements.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app, meta tags, and PWA manifest.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and offline fallbacks for the PWA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry setting up routing, theme provider, query client, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileM: Renders a user profile dropdown with avatar, navigation links, and sign‑in/sign‑out logic using Internet Identity and user profile data.
frontend/src/components/account/ThemeTog: Provides dropdown menu items for switching between light, dark, and system themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation component with links and icons for main app sections.
frontend/src/components/ChannelHeader.ts: Displays a channel header with avatar, stats, and follow button, with a skeleton loading state.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Renders comments for a video and provides an input form for posting new comments with authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Button that toggles follow state with optional login and simulated async update.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main app header with logo, search bar, notifications, and profile menu, including mobile-specific behavior.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper containing header, sidebar, bottom navigation, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Displays a notifications dropdown with unread counts, icons by type, timestamp formatting, and mark‑as‑read actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Implements a dialog for editing user profile fields, syncing initial data and submitting updates via onSave.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Shows a prompt to install the PWA, handling iOS and browser install flows and dismissal state.
frontend/src/components/settings/MoodAIS: Shows and updates user Mood AI preferences, including enabling the feature and selecting a mood, with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Desktop sidebar navigation listing main routes with active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card displaying video thumbnail, title, channel info, and view/time metadata with navigation links.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Streams video chunks into a blob URL with progress, error handling, and offline/placeholder states.
frontend/src/components/watch/useWatchSh: Hook providing share functionality using the Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/watch/WatchActio: Renders video action buttons (like, dislike, comment, share, save, download) with count formatting and state indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Handles chunked video uploads with progress tracking, cancel, and retry logic using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodSignals.ts: Tracks watch, like, and activity signals in localStorage and infers a user mood from engagement patterns.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads, seeds, and manages per‑user notifications in localStorage with read/unread controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating video data, metadata, and interactions using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useShortUpload.ts: Uploads short videos via ExternalBlob with simple progress tracking and returns a direct URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme variables, utilities, and layout tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/followCopy.ts: Provides UI copy strings for follow-related actions, navigation labels, and follower count formatting.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges and deduplicates class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/videoFileMetadata.ts: Extracts duration and resolution from a video file asynchronously with timeout fallback.
frontend/src/lib/videoStreamSource.ts: Streams video chunks from the backend, validates them, and can assemble a full blob URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a channel profile with editable fields and mock video listings, handling identity and profile fetching.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Shows videos from followed channels or prompts login, using mock video data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a static list of mock video cards.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Shows uploaded, liked, and saved videos with identity checks and backend metadata queries.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Implements a multi-section settings UI for general, playback, privacy, and notification preferences.
frontend/src/pages/ShortsPage.tsx: Displays shorts with mood‑based recommendations, handles scroll-driven watch tracking, video playback, and fallback filtering.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Handles authenticated video uploads with chunked uploading, metadata extraction, and redirects to the watch page on success.
frontend/src/pages/UploadShortPage.tsx: Uploads short videos under 60 seconds using blob storage, then registers the short in the backend and navigates to the shorts feed.
frontend/src/pages/WatchPage.tsx: Shows a video watch page with metadata, interactions, comments, and watch-time recording, including online/offline handling.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers and manages the service worker in production, with update detection and utilities for unregistering and checking PWA state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, radii, and a set of CSS variable–driven colors, with animate and typography plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing and new feature requests related to removing transparency in UI dropdowns and user bar backgrounds.
